quests.name: Azura
quests.description: Kill some former worshippers of Azura who have been turned into vampires.

quests.name: Boethia
quests.description: Prove your worthiness to Boethia in the Tournament of Ten Bloods.

quests.name: Clavicus Vile
quests.description: Retrieve the infamous sword Umbra from a regretful killer.

quests.name: Hermaeus Mora
quests.description: Capture one soul from each of the ten races of Tamriel.

quests.name: Hircine
quests.description: You must make an offering of a bear or wolf pelt... and the horn of a Unicorn.

quests.name: Mephala
quests.description: Start a feud between two prominent families.

quests.name: Meridia
quests.description: Wipe out a band of necromancers.

quests.name: Molag Bal
quests.description: Goad the local do-gooder into killing you.

quests.name: Namira
quests.description: Assist Namira's Forgotten in eliminating some priests.

quests.name: Nocturnal
quests.description: Recover the Eye of Nocturnal from a pair of thieves in Leyawiin.

quests.name: Peryite
quests.description: Peryite wants you to enter the Realm of Peryite and rescue the souls of his worshippers from their folly.

quests.name: Sanguine
quests.description: Crash a dinner party at Castle Leyawiin by playing a prank for Sanguine.

quests.name: Sheogorath
quests.description: Fulfill an apocalyptic prophecy to satisfy Sheogorath's morbid sense of humor.

quests.name: Vaermina
quests.description: Retrieve the Orb of Vaermina from the wizard, Arkved.
